# component

**Instance Property**

The component found in the component description with which the audio unit was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var component: AudioComponent { get }
```

## Describing the Audio Unit

- **componentDescription**: The component description with which the audio unit was created.
- **componentName**: The audio unit’s component’s name.
- **componentVersion**: The audio unit’s component’s version.
- **audioUnitName**: The audio unit’s name, derived from the component’s name.
- **audioUnitShortName**
- **manufacturerName**: The manufacturer’s name, derived from the component’s name.

items.description: The component description with which the audio unit was created.

items.description: The audio unit’s name, derived from the component’s name.
